description.p: Recursive scan directory, DICOMDIR, Read from CTK database.

2D and 3D views with many tools, Study view with intersections, volume rendering, 3D view also for non-uniform images, Multi-planar reconstruction, RTSTRUCT contours.
Consistely de-identify DICOM, preserve integrity.
2D+t and 3D+t animations.
Structured Reports (SR).
Grayscale Softcopy Presentation State (PR).
DICOM metadata viewer.
Most IODs are supported, Ultrasound with proper measurement in Calibrated Regions, Siemens Mosaic, United Imaging Healthcare (UIH) Grid / VFrame, sequential and interleaved 4D Series, Parametric Map, Supplemental Lookup Palette Color, Elscint ELSCINT1 PMSCT_RLE1 and PMSCT_RGB1.
